data.description:
For the rest of the scene, Veil Breaches canʼt be opened, and whenever a foe is destroyed, create a VOID BLOOM at its Speed. VOID BLOOMS last until the end of the scene, count as Veil Breaches for friendly powers and abilities, and donʼt count for Incursion. Allies that end their turns Matched to one or more VOID BLOOMS may clear 3 Drive Stress.

Close all open Veil Breaches and create VOID BLOOMS in their place now.
